Data Fields
DPM_InitCfg_t Struct Reference
DPM API » DPM External Data Structures

Initialization configuration. More...

#include <control/dpm/dpm.h>

Data Fields

SOC_Handle socHandle
 Handle to the SOC Driver.
 
DPM_Domain domain
 Execution domain.
 
uint32_t instanceId
 Each DPM Instance should be allocated a unique identifier This will be reported to the application through the reporting mechanism Unique DPM Instance identifiers are especially useful if operating in a Distributed domain mode.
 
void * arg
 This is an argument which is passed to the processing chain during initialization. The DPM framework does not interpret this and passes this as is to the processing chain. For more information please refer to the processing chain documentation.
 
uint32_t argSize
 This is the size of the argument specified above. This is not used by the DPM framework but is passed as is to the processing chain. For more information please refer to the processing chain documentation.
 
struct DPM_ProcChainCfg_t * ptrProcChainCfg
 Pointer to the processing configuration which is to be loaded and executed in the DPM Instance.
 
DPM_ReportFxn reportFxn
 Report Function: The DPM module will invoke the application registered function to report events and status about the processing chain.
 

Detailed Description

Initialization configuration.

The structure is used to initialize the DPM module
